title: The great mystery of godliness Jesus Christ our Lord God and man, and man with God; one in Jesus Christ our Lord. By Mr. Erbury minister of the word.
author: Erbery, William, 1604-1654.
publisher: Printed by M. F[lesher] for Rob. Milbourne, in little Britain, at the signe of the Holy Lambe,
notes: An edition of: The great mystery of godlinesse.
Helps to devotion, partly in outline form.
Identified as STC 10511a on UMI microfilm, reel 738.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
